Base.name: Radiant Bolt
Base.description: Fires a radiant projectile that deals holy damage.

Base.name: Bless
Base.description: Increases allies' attack and saving throws.

Base.name: Shield of Faith
Base.description: Increases an ally’s armor class by 2 for 3 rounds.

Base.name: Divine Smite
Base.description: Deals radiant damage, bonus damage vs undead or fiends.

Base.name: Prayer of Warding
Base.description: Reduces all incoming damage by 25% for 2 turns.

Base.name: Radiant Storm
Base.description: Large AoE radiant damage that also blinds enemies.

Base.name: Divine Intercession
Base.description: Prevents one ally from dying for one turn (once per long rest).

God Fearing.name: Divine Restriction
God Fearing.description: Enemy can only move or attack next turn, not both.

God Fearing.name: Excommunication
God Fearing.description: Enemy cannot receive any buffs or healing for 3 turns.

God Fearing.name: Chains of Judgment
God Fearing.description: Roots and silences enemy on failed save.

God Fearing.name: Holy Silence
God Fearing.description: Enemies in area cannot use abilities for 1 turn.

God Fearing.name: Final Atonement
God Fearing.description: Applies all God Fearing debuffs in a large AoE (once per long rest).

War Cleric.name: Retributive Wrath
War Cleric.description: Reflects all damage taken to an enemy.

War Cleric.name: Battle Blessing
War Cleric.description: All allies gain +1 to AC and +10% damage for 3 turns.

War Cleric.name: Martyr's Redemption
War Cleric.description: Intercepts killing blow for an ally and redirects it to self.

Base.name: Prayer of Light
Base.description: Heals a single ally.

Base.name: Holy Barrier
Base.description: Increase AC temporarily.

Base.name: Soothing Hymn
Base.description: AOE healing over 2 turns.

Base.name: Celestial Light
Base.description: Boosts all healing received by 20%.

Base.name: Divine Pulse
Base.description: Pushes enemies back and deals light damage.

Savior.name: Greater Heal
Savior.description: Moderate heal to one or weak heal to all.

Savior.name: Hope Beacon
Savior.description: Heals and removes debuffs on all allies.

Savior.name: Resurrect
Savior.description: Revives a fallen ally at half HP.

Savior.name: Angelic Protection
Savior.description: One ally becomes immune to damage for 1 turn.

Combat Medic.name: Battle Clarity
Combat Medic.description: Reduces cooldowns and action costs for 1 turn.

Combat Medic.name: Field Commander
Combat Medic.description: Grants all allies one free movement or attack action.

Base.name: Arcane Missile
Base.description: Guaranteed arcane hit.

Base.name: Shield
Base.description: Increases AC until next turn.

Base.name: Blink
Base.description: Short-range teleport.

Base.name: Arcane Wave
Base.description: Mid-damage wave that pushes enemies.

Base.name: Magic Echo
Base.description: Cast most recent spell again.

Dragon Mage.name: Molten Breath
Dragon Mage.description: Fire damage, chance to reduce AC.

Dragon Mage.name: Soulfire Surge
Dragon Mage.description: Top-tier fire spell. Max burn + stun chance.

Chronomancer.name: Ice Time
Chronomancer.description: Freeze enemies in AoE for 1 turn.

Chronomancer.name: Future Echo
Chronomancer.description: See next enemy move and counter.

Chronomancer.name: Absolute Zero
Chronomancer.description: Freeze all enemies. High damage. Once/day.

Base.name: Taunt
Base.description: Force enemy to attack you next turn.

Base.name: Defend
Base.description: Increase AC by 2 until next turn.

Base.name: Cleave
Base.description: Attack all enemies in adjacent squares.

Base.name: Charge
Base.description: Move 2 squares and attack with +2 damage.

Base.name: Battle Cry
Base.description: Allies gain +1 to attack rolls for 2 turns.

Base.name: Second Wind
Base.description: Heal for 1d10 + level HP once per combat.

Base.name: Action Surge
Base.description: Gain an extra action this turn.

Base.name: Indomitable
Base.description: Reroll a failed saving throw once per long rest.

Fighter.name: Precision Strike
Fighter.description: Next attack has advantage and deals +1d6 damage.

Fighter.name: Combat Superiority
Fighter.description: Reduce enemy's next attack damage by 1d8.

Fighter.name: Tactical Mastery
Fighter.description: Gain +2 to all attack rolls for 1 turn.

Barbarian.name: Rage
Barbarian.description: Gain +2 damage and resistance to physical damage.

Barbarian.name: Reckless Attack
Barbarian.description: Attack with advantage but enemies have advantage against you.

Barbarian.name: Relentless Rage
Barbarian.description: When reduced to 0 HP, make a save to stay at 1 HP.

Base.name: Divine Smite
Base.description: Add radiant damage to weapon attack.

Base.name: Lay on Hands
Base.description: Heal target for 5 × level HP.

Base.name: Aura of Protection
Base.description: Allies within 2 squares gain +1 to saving throws.

Base.name: Divine Sense
Base.description: Detect undead, fiends, and celestials within 10 squares.

Base.name: Divine Health
Base.description: Immune to disease.

Base.name: Divine Favor
Base.description: Weapon attacks deal +1d4 radiant damage for 1 minute.

Base.name: Aura of Courage
Base.description: Allies within aura are immune to fear.

Base.name: Improved Divine Smite
Base.description: Weapon attacks deal +1d8 radiant damage.

Devotion.name: Sacred Weapon
Devotion.description: Weapon becomes magical and deals +1d4 radiant damage.

Devotion.name: Turn the Unholy
Devotion.description: Force undead and fiends to flee for 1 minute.

Devotion.name: Aura of Devotion
Devotion.description: Allies within aura cannot be charmed.

Devotion.name: Holy Nimbus
Devotion.description: Radiant aura damages enemies and heals allies.

Vengeance.name: Vow of Enmity
Vengeance.description: Gain advantage on attacks against one enemy for 1 minute.

Vengeance.name: Relentless Avenger
Vengeance.description: When you hit with opportunity attack, move up to half speed.

Vengeance.name: Soul of Vengeance
Vengeance.description: When enemy attacks ally, you can make opportunity attack.

Vengeance.name: Avenging Angel
Vengeance.description: Gain flight and +2 to all attack rolls for 1 minute.

Base.name: Hunter's Mark
Base.description: Mark target for +1d6 damage on attacks.

Base.name: Volley
Base.description: Attack all enemies in a 3x3 area.

Base.name: Cure Wounds
Base.description: Heal target for 1d8 + modifier HP.

Base.name: Goodberry
Base.description: Create 10 berries that heal 1 HP each.

Base.name: Favored Enemy
Base.description: Gain +2 damage against chosen enemy type.

Base.name: Natural Explorer
Base.description: Gain advantage on initiative rolls.

Base.name: Hide in Plain Sight
Base.description: Become invisible when not moving for 1 minute.

Base.name: Feral Senses
Base.description: Cannot be surprised and have advantage on perception checks.

Hunter.name: Colossus Slayer
Hunter.description: Deal +1d8 damage to damaged enemies once per turn.

Hunter.name: Giant Killer
Hunter.description: When large+ enemy attacks you, make opportunity attack.

Hunter.name: Horde Breaker
Hunter.description: Make extra attack against different enemy within 5 feet.

Beast Master.name: Ranger's Companion
Beast Master.description: Summon a beast companion to fight with you.

Beast Master.name: Exceptional Training
Beast Master.description: Beast companion can take the Help action.

Beast Master.name: Bestial Fury
Beast Master.description: Beast companion can make two attacks.

Beast Master.name: Share Spells
Beast Master.description: When you cast a spell, beast companion also benefits.
